caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. ROBERT DWIGHT PEART,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Third Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Motion for leave to prosecute appeal as a poor person granted. The appeal may be perfected upon one typewritten copy of the record and five typewritten copies of the brief.
